### Visit docs: https://github.com/oobianom/r2resize

# Install and Use

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages(r2resize)
library(r2resize)
```

# Theme setting

## empahsisCard function: container with moving border 

```{r}

r2resize::emphasisCard(shiny::div(
    shiny::tags$h2("Question"),
     shiny::tags$h4("Let's begin with a simply curiousity. Do you consider yourself successful? If you do, then why?")
  ), bg.color = "#f1f1f1")

```
